name: Firefox 4: Sleek dialog boxes
description:
At least for me, the default dialog boxes (Alert, confirm, and prompt) look dire!
So... I fixed that :)

The background I've gone for isn't the best, so I've left 2 others in the CSS.
If you come up with a better BG, give me a shout. :)
additional_info: Future proofed the CSS rules, keeping the -moz prefixed ones for legacy installs, on 07/05/2013
